title: Indian Diplomat Khobragade’s ‘human rights’ treatment shows how grateful US is to India
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Firstly, what must be said is that if Devyani Khobragade did wrong whether she is an American, an Indian or a diplomat a wrong is a wrong. Both India and Ms. Khobragade has to accept this. Therefore, the question of her innocence is not what is being argued. What…
